hooks.command: python3 scripts/state-manager.py context 2>/dev/null || echo 'Genius Team v6.2 - Say "I want to build..." to start'

if [ -f .genius/STATE.json ]; then python3 -c "import json; s=json.load(open('.genius/STATE.json')); t=s['tasks']; print(f'Tasks: {t["completed"]}/{t["total"]} | Current: {t["current_task_id"] or "none"}')"; fi

if [ -f .genius/STATE.json ]; then for f in DISCOVERY.xml MARKET-ANALYSIS.xml SPECIFICATIONS.xml DESIGN-SYSTEM.html design-config.json ARCHITECTURE.md .claude/plan.md; do if [ -f "$f" ]; then python3 -c "import json; s=json.load(open('.genius/STATE.json')); s['artifacts']['$f']=True; json.dump(s,open('.genius/STATE.json','w'),indent=2)" 2>/dev/null; fi; done; fi
python3 scripts/state-manager.py precompact 2>/dev/null || echo 'No state to preserve'

if [ -f .genius/STATE.json ]; then phase=$(python3 -c "import json; print(json.load(open('.genius/STATE.json'))['phase'])"); if [ "$phase" = "EXECUTION" ]; then completed=$(python3 -c "import json; s=json.load(open('.genius/STATE.json')); print(s['tasks']['completed'])"); total=$(python3 -c "import json; s=json.load(open('.genius/STATE.json')); print(s['tasks']['total'])"); if [ "$completed" -lt "$total" ]; then echo '{"decision":"block","reason":"Execution in progress: '$completed'/'$total' tasks. Say STOP to force quit."}'; exit 0; fi; fi; fi; echo '{"decision":"approve"}'
